rooms.name: Corridor
rooms.description: A long corridor with a door at the end, you see a steel beam fallen on top of a woman wearing an engineers's jumpsuit and hear her calling for help, you see flickering flames inbetween yourself and the enginerer, but you also see a fire extinguisher in the wall!

rooms.name: Engineering

rooms.name: Storage
